predict_diagnosis:
1. Hypertension-induced renal hamartoma (肾脏良性肿块)
2. Hyperactive deep tendon reflexes ( hyperreflexia )
3. Pontocerebellar atrophy (脑桥-小脑萎缩)
4. Aneurysm (动脉瘤)
5. Dysgraphia (书写困难)
6. Chaddock reflex (查多克反射)
7. Abnormal cerebral white matter morphology (大脑 white  matter 形态异常)
8. Ankle clonus (踝关节屈曲无力)
9. Palmomental reflex (手掌反射)
10. Dysuria (尿路不畅)
